body_content.explanation: in or relating to a period after the end of imperial rule (= the control of a group of countries by another country under a single ruler in an empire):
examples: The Roman Senate continued to function during the post-imperial period.

body_content.explanation: in or relating to a period after the British Empire stopped existing:
examples: He was looking for a way in which post-imperial Britain could continue to assert its authority on the world.
The crisis illustrated the confusion regarding Britain's post-imperial role.
